languages.text: {n}Первым отводит глаза Маттиас.{/n} "Простите мою бестактность, леди... Кхм. Мне показалось, я вас уже встречал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Первым отводит глаза Маттиас.{/n} "Простите мою бестактность, леди... Кхм. Простите. Мне показалось, я вас уже где-то встречал".

languages.text: {n}Mattis looks away first.{/n} "Pardon my tactlessness, Mistress..." {n}He clears his throat.{/n} "I have the strangest feeling that we have met before."
languages.original_text: {n}Первым отводит глаза Маттиас.{/n} "Простите мою бестактность, леди... Кхм. Мне показалось, я вас уже встречал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Mattis looks away first.{/n} "Pardon my tactlessness, Lady— Ahem. I was under the impression I had met you before."
{n}Mattis looks away first.{/n} "Pardon my tactlessness, Lady— Ahem. I was under the impression I had met you before."
{n}Mattis looks away first.{/n} "Pardon my tactlessness, Lady— Ahem. I have the strangest feeling that we have met before."
{n}Mattis looks away first.{/n} "Pardon my tactlessness, Lady— Ahem. I have the strangest feeling that we have met before."
{n}Mattis looks away first.{/n} "Pardon my tactlessness, Mistress..." {n}He clears his throat.{/n} "I have the strangest feeling that we have met before."
{n}Mattis looks away first.{/n} "Pardon my tactlessness, Mistress..." {n}He clears his throat.{/n} "I have the strangest feeling that we have met before."

languages.text: {n}Mattis est le premier à détourner le regard.{/n} « Pardonnez mon manque de tact, maîtresse... {n}dit-il en se raclant la gorge.{/n} Mais j'ai la vague impression de vous avoir déjà rencontrée par le passé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Mattis looks away first.{/n} "Pardon my tactlessness, Mistress..." {n}He clears his throat.{/n} "I have the strangest feeling that we have met before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mattis est le premier à détourner le regard.{/n} « Pardonnez mon manque de tact, maîtresse... {n}dit-il en se raclant la gorge.{/n} Mais j'ai la vague impression de vous avoir déjà rencontrée par le passé. »

languages.text: {n}Mattis es el primero en apartar la vista.{/n} «Perdone mi falta de tacto, maestra...». {n}Carraspea.{/n} «Tengo la extraña sensación de que nos hemos visto antes».
languages.original_text: {n}Mattis looks away first.{/n} "Pardon my tactlessness, Mistress..." {n}He clears his throat.{/n} "I have the strangest feeling that we have met before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mattis es el primero en apartar la vista.{/n} «Perdone mi falta de tacto, maestra...». {n}Carraspea.{/n} «Tengo la extraña sensación de que nos hemos visto antes».

languages.text: {n}マティスが先に目をそらした。{/n}「失礼をお許しください…」{n}青年は咳払いをした。{/n}「おかしな話ですが、以前どこかでお会いしたことはないでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Mattis looks away first.{/n} "Pardon my tactlessness, Mistress..." {n}He clears his throat.{/n} "I have the strangest feeling that we have met before."

traits.locale_text: {n}マティスが先に目をそらした。{/n}「失礼をお許しください…」{n}青年は咳払いをした。{/n}「おかしな話ですが、以前どこかでお会いしたことはないでしょうか？」

languages.text: {n}马蒂斯率先移开了视线。{/n}“请原谅我的突兀，女士……”{n}他清了清喉咙。{/n}“我有种非常古怪的感觉，好像之前在哪里见过你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Mattis looks away first.{/n} "Pardon my tactlessness, Mistress..." {n}He clears his throat.{/n} "I have the strangest feeling that we have met before."

traits.locale_text: {n}马蒂斯率先移开了视线。{/n}“请原谅我的突兀，女士……”{n}他清了清喉咙。{/n}“我有种非常古怪的感觉，好像之前在哪里见过你。”

languages.text: {n}Mattis wendet den Blick zuerst ab.{/n} "Verzeiht meine Taktlosigkeit, Herrin ..." {n}Er räuspert sich.{/n} "Ich habe das merkwürdige Gefühl, dass wir uns schon einmal begegnet sind."
languages.original_text: {n}Mattis looks away first.{/n} "Pardon my tactlessness, Mistress..." {n}He clears his throat.{/n} "I have the strangest feeling that we have met before."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mattis wendet den Blick zuerst ab.{/n} "Verzeiht meine Taktlosigkeit, Herrin ..." {n}Er räuspert sich.{/n} "Ich habe das merkwürdige Gefühl, dass wir uns schon einmal begegnet sind."

languages.text: {n}Bakışlarını ilk çeviren Mattis oluyor.{/n} "Münasebetsizliğimi mazur görün Hanımefendi..." {n}Boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "Daha önce karşılaştığımıza dair tuhaf bir hisse kapıldım."
languages.original_text: {n}Mattis looks away first.{/n} "Pardon my tactlessness, Mistress..." {n}He clears his throat.{/n} "I have the strangest feeling that we have met before."
